New Records: Sunil Chhetri is the oldest player in the AFC Asian Cup 2024 at 39 years old
Pre-Game Insights: The match is expected to be a close encounter as both teams aim for an early lead in Group B
Sunil Chhetri will lead the Indian Football Team in their crucial match against Australia
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian Football Team is known as the'sleeping giant' and aims to make a significant impact in the AFC Asian Cup 2024
The match is the first of India's campaign in the tournament and is crucial for their hopes
Others: The match is scheduled to be played at the Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, Al Rayyan
The Indian Football Team's squad includes notable players like Sunil Chhetri, Gurpreet Singh Sandhu, and others
